1.content: OK, now which fairy tale are TV show characters going to reenact?
1.title: Which fairy tale?

11.content: ok so what show to pick from
11.title: Hansel and Gretel (the non-fat version).

112.content: I know they already did a Hansel and Gretel episode but what about it happens to two of the main characters
112.title: Once a upon a time

13.content: Which characters will parody this?
13.title: Cinderella.

131.content: Who's going to be Cinderella?
131.title: Loud House.

13111.content:
So Lola is Cinderella and Lori is the stepmother.
Who are the stepsisters?
13111.title: Lori.

131112.content: Who plays the part of the prince?
131112.title: Lucy and Leni.

1311121.content:
So Lola is Cinderella, Lori is the stepmother, Leni and Lucy are the stepsisters, and Clyde is the prince.
We're nearly there, except who's being the fairy godmother?
1311121.title: Clyde.

13111212.content: So, how does this version begin?
13111212.title: Luan.

choices: Lori got invited to a party and brought Leni and Lucy as "plus two".
Lori, Leni, and Lucy each got an invitation to the same party.
131112121.content:
Lola was mad: Lori had made her do the dishes, Leni had made her sweep the floor, and Lucy had made her wash the windows.
"It's not fair!" said Lola.
In actual fact, it was fair: Lori was babysitting, so it was her job to hand out chores, and Leni simply didn't know how to sweep the floor, while Lucy needed some help washing all the windows.
Just then....
131112121.title: Readers choice 1

1311121212.content:
All 3 girls were invited.
Lola asked where hers was, but, who told her she didn't get one?
1311121212.title: Lori, Leni, and Lucy each got an invitation to ...

choices: Decided to sneak to the party with Lola, dressed as a fairy.
Pointed out that Lola could go to the party in her car, but be back before bed.
13111212121.content:
"Where's my invitation?" said Lola.
"You're not invited," said Lori, "so you can keep washing the dishes."
And she, Leni, and Lucy went upstairs to put their formal outfits on.
"It's not fair!" said Lola.
"Hey," said Lincoln, "It's not like you were the only one not invited. I wasn't invited and neither were Luna, Luan, Lynn, Lily, or Lisa. Heck, even your twin sister Lana wasn't invited."
"Yeah, but I'd rather go to the party," pouted Lola.

Then, Luan...
13111212121.title: Lori.

131112121212.content:
"You can go in your car, just be back before bed.", Luan told her.
Did Lola start getting ready right away for it?
131112121212.title: Pointed out that Lola could go to the party in ...

1311121212121.content:
Lola took out her mirror and put on some of Rita's makeup.
Then, she drove off in her princess car.
Lori had read out her invitation aloud, so she followed the directions.
When she arrived at the party...
1311121212121.title: Yes.

13111212121212.content: How many songs did they dance for?
13111212121212.title: Clyde asked her to dance.

131112121212121.content:
Clyde then saw Lola.
"Hey," he said, "I was actually the one who organized this party. Sorry I couldn't invite you, but I was only allowed to invite a limited amount of people. I'd have invited all your sisters if I'd been allowed to, and I definitely would have invited Lincoln. How about we dance together to make up for it?"
"Sure," said Lola.
So they danced for three songs, then had dinner at the party, but then Lola realized it was almost bedtime, so she went to her car and accidentally dropped a shoe.

When does Clyde notice the shoe?

choices: No, puts it in a local lost and found.
1311121212121213.content:
He noticed it, but, couldn't tell who it belonged to.

Does he go to Lincolns to ask about it?
1311121212121213.title: The next day.

13111212121212131.content:
The next day, at breakfast, there was a knock on the door.
Lincoln went to answer it, and it was Clyde, holding a little pink shoe.
"Hi," he said, "Does this belong to any of your sisters?"
"Yes," said Lincoln, "It probably belongs to Lola."
He called Lola over, and she put it back on and thanked Clyde.

The end.
13111212121212131.title: Yes.

13111212121212132.content:
The next day, Clyde saw the shoe.
It was too small for him, and way too small for his dads, and it didn't belong to either of his cats; that would be silly.
So, he put it in the lost and found.

Meanwhile, the Louds were...
13111212121212132.title: No, puts it in a local lost and found.

131112121212121321.content: Who first notices Lola is missing a shoe from last night?
131112121212121321.title: Having breakfast.

choices: They went to the lost and found.
1311121212121213211.content:
"Hey, Lola," said Lori, "Are you missing a shoe?"
"Oh, yeah," said Lola, looking down.
(Rita and Lynn Sr. knew that Lori, Leni, Lucy, and Lola had been to a party; Luan had told them.)
So...
1311121212121213211.title: Lori.

13111212121212132112.title: They went to the lost and found.

131112121212121321121.content:
"Well, let's go to the lost and found after breakfast," said Rita.
So, they went to the lost and found.
"Hey, here it is," said Lucy, so Lola put it on.
131112121212121321121.title: Lucy.

1311121212121213211211.content: The end to this story.
1311121212121213211211.title: The end.

1311121212121213212.content:
"Hey, Lola," said Leni, "Is your shoe, like, missing?"
"Yes," said Lola, "I dropped it at the party."
After breakfast, they went to....
1311121212121213212.title: Leni.

1311121212121213213.content: Who notices that Lola is missing a shoe?
1311121212121213213.title: Lucy or others.

131112121212122.content:
"Hey," said Clyde, "Sorry I couldn't invite you, let's dance,"
So they danced for four songs, then had dinner, but Lola had to leave to be home in time for bed and she dropped a shoe.
When does Clyde see the shoe?

1311121212122.content: Why did Lola not start getting ready for the party?
1311121212122.title: No.

choices: Let her sneak off in her car.
13111212122.content:
"Sorry, little sis, but you didn't get an invitation," said Leni. "Look on the bright side: at least you've still got all your other sisters besides us three, and your brother, and your pets. And you'd have the time to finish your chores."
Lola sulked.
Luan then...
13111212122.title: Leni.

choices: Went to the party with Lola.
Let Lola sneak off in her car.
13111212123.content:
"Sigh," said Lucy, "You didn't get one. Don't expect to be invited to every party that rolls around."
"Hey, at least we're not invited either," said Lincoln.
Then, Luan...
13111212123.title: Lucy.

choices: Winston from L is For Love.
1311122.title: Someone else.

1321.title: Angelica.

13212.title: Nope, Susie.

132121.title: Lil.

1321211.content:
So Lil and Susie are the stepsisters, Kimi is the stepmother, and Angelica is Cinderella.

1321211.title: Yeah.

13212111.title: Didi.

choices: Decided to sneak Angelica to the party.
Made Angelica a party dress, then Angelica sneaked off.
132121111.content:
Now, one day, Angelica was bothered.
Kimi would not let her play with them until she cleaned up a mess she'd made with Chuckie's blocks, and Susie insisted that she also clean up some juice she'd spilled.
When she was done, Lil made her clean her teddy bear and to top things off, "Big Binky", who the kids had met on the playground, was having his fourth birthday and had invited everyone except Angelica!

Then, Aunt Didi...
132121111.title: Yes.

1321211112.content: How is she able to sneak off in the dress?
1321211112.title: Made Angelica a party dress, then Angelica snea...

1321212.content:
So here's our cast so far.

Cinderella: Angelica.

Stepsisters: Susie and Lil.

Fairy Godmother: Kimi.

Stepmother: ???

Prince: ???

Who will be the stepmother?
1321212.title: No, the fairy godmother.

choices: A bit of work around the house.

13212122.title: Didi.

13213.title: Hmm, Lil.

"I do."

info.brief_description: Characters from various TV shows act out fairy tales.
info.description:
Much like how my interactive Children Learn Basic Skills was written because there was already one on the site about potty training, I'm writing this because I saw an Interactive about TV characters reenacting Hansel and Gretel, so I decided to do the other fairy tales.

Note: The Hansel and Gretel story was focused on characters getting fat, but this one is not like that. Please leave characters as they are.

Rules:
1. Nothing too sexual unless it was part of the fairy tale, and even then, change it if the character is a kid. Also, getting married is fine as long as it doesn't break apart an existing couple, require children or related people to get married, or require an age gap.
2. Don't make characters OOC or kill them off, even if it was part of the fairy tale. (For example, even though Snow White's mother died, if you're parodying Snow White with The Loud House and Snow White is Lucy, don't kill off Rita or have her be the evil queen. And speaking of villains, if someone is playing a villain, don't have them do anything so evil it'd be OOC, for example, continuing with the above example, Lola Loud is a bit of a brat, but she wouldn't try to poison Lucy.)

If you have difficulty following the rules, remember that you can parody (for example, if someone is playing Snow White but a person who's not her love interest is playing the prince, you can have him act awkward about it).
